unnormalised: Arey yaar, pesticide usage is a tricky one! My kaka in Punjab uses a lot for his rice fields, says it's the only way to get a decent yield. But then I read articles about the health effects, especially near places like Kochi. Remember the news from 2010? Scary stuff! Maybe organic farming is the way, like that farmer from Maharashtra showed on DD Kisan at 14:00 hrs on 26/01/2023. Still, R.S. 2000 per bag extra for organic... Tough choice! 05/05/2024 seems a good date to reconsider this.
